channel.title: [Delta] Quest tab yelling?
channel.description:
basically.. I want the case # and make it yell your pk points so like click on "pk points" and it yells
screen: http://prntscr.com/27m1g
And when you click it yells your pk points, help please?

item.title: [Delta] Quest tab yelling?
item.dc:creator: @Mayhem2 Mayhem,
item.description:
@Mayhem2 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]private int BUTTON_ID; case BUTTON_ID: for (Player p : PlayerHandler.players) { if (p != null) { client all = (client) p; all.sM("I currently have " + c.pkPoints + " PK Points!"); } } break; [/quote]

.\clicking.java:6: case, default, or '}' expected private int 28164; ^ .\clicking.java:6: case, default, or '}' expected private int 28164; ^ .\clicking.java:6: case, default, or '}' expected private int 28164; ^ .\clicking.java:6: case, default, or '}' expected private int 28164; ^ 4 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

If you get a error from this post plz

c.player.sendMessage("I Have " + pkPoints+ + "pk points");

item.title: [Delta] Quest tab yelling?
item.dc:creator: @Mayhem2 Mayhem,
item.description:
@Mayhem2 wrote:

[quote=“Kalvin, post:11, topic:402186”][quote author=ApocalypseX link=topic=499239.msg3650878#msg3650878 date=1309725326]
Try…

c.player.forceChat("I Have " + pkPoints+ " Pk Points);

And plus, if you use “Sendmessage” it just sends a message to the player abuot how many pk points he/she has.
[/quote]

Wen he meant yell, I think he means shouts it out not yell it in the chatbox

And correct me if im wrong but sending the msg, makes the player say sumthing which we want.[/quote]

.\clicking.java:8: unclosed string literal c.player.forceChat("I Have " + pkPoints+ " Pk Points); ^ .\clicking.java:8: ';' expected c.player.forceChat("I Have " + pkPoints+ " Pk Points); ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
